comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Requests

Class RequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Requests.RequestController

  • public class RequestController
extends java.lang.Object

    Uses a singleton pattern to store information about three types of requests. (Request requested, requests offered to complete, and requests searched for.


    See code attribution in Wiki: RequestController


    Based on: osmdroid bonus pack reverse geolocation

    Author: cristina

    Posted on: October 6th, 2014

    Retrieved on: November 11th, 2016

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String DRIVER_FILENAME
      The file name of the locally saved offered driver requests.

      The file name of the locally saved queue of driver offers.

      The file name of the locally saved offline rider requests.
      private static OfferCommandList offlineDriverOfferCommands
      Offer commands that drivers make on a request while offline that are put on elastic search when there is connection.

      The context with which to save
      private static java.lang.String SEARCH_FILENAME
      The file name of the locally saved driver search results (50 most recent).
      private static RequestList searchResult
      Holds requests that have been searched for by the user.

        public static void setContext(android.content.Context contextToSet)
        In order to save to file, we require a context. This function sets the context.
        Parameters:
        contextToSet - The context in which to save.

        Returns an instance of all requests where the user has offered to drive

      • addDriver

        public static void addDriver(Request request,
                             User driver)
        Is used to add a driver to a specified request (the request should be in the request controller).
        Parameters:
        request - The request we are modifying
        driver - the driver that is being added as a driver for the request.
        See Also:
        Offer

                                 User driver)
        Is used accept a given driver (who has offered) for the request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request that is being modified
        driver - The driver that is being accepted

        public static void completeRequest(Request request)
        Marks a request as complete in elastic search.
        Parameters:

        Sets a request as paid for.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to mark as paid

      • searchByKeyword

        public static void searchByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
        Search requests by the keyword, will set it so the singleton contains the information for this query. Use getResults() to get the information.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword the user wants to query for requests with

      • searchByLocation

        public static void searchByLocation(android.location.Location location)
        Search requests by a location. This sets it so the singleton contains the information for this query. Use getResults() to get the information.
        Parameters:
        location - The location the user wants to query for requests with

      • verifyRequestAvailable

        public static boolean verifyRequestAvailable(java.lang.String requestId)
        Verifies that request status is available, which means that it is either "OPEN" or "OFFERED".
        Parameters:
        requestId - The request whose status we want to verify to be available.
        Returns:
        boolean The boolean indicates whether or not the request is still available

      • getOfferedRequests

        public static RequestList getOfferedRequests(User driver)
        Is used to provide a driver with a list of the requests that the driver has offered to give a ride.
        Parameters:
        driver - The driver who is requesting the list of the requests they have offered but the rider has no confirmed their choice in driver.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of requests that the driver has offered to give a ride on.

      • clearAllRiderRequests

        public static void clearAllRiderRequests(User rider)
        Used for testing. Clears out all the requested requests for a user in elastic search.
        Parameters:
        rider - The rider whose requests should be cleared

      • fetchRequestsWhereRider

        public static RequestList fetchRequestsWhereRider(User rider,
                                                  Request.Status... statuses)
        Has the same function as fetchAllRequestsWhereRider(comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Users.User), but allows the ability to filter by status integers (provided by the Request class).
        Parameters:
        rider - the rider you want to match requests against
        statuses - the statues you would like to see (filters non listed ones) (null means grab all)
        Returns:
        A list of requests from the given criteria
        See Also:
        fetchAllRequestsWhereRider(User), Request, Request.Status

      • fetchAllRequestsWhereRider

        public static RequestList fetchAllRequestsWhereRider(User rider)
        Use this to grab requests for the given rider, however it may be better to use the async update method as it will not lock up the UI thread. This method also updates the singleton instance of the rider's requests.
        Parameters:
        rider - the rider you wish to find requests for.
        Returns:
        The requests found by this search (locks UI thread).
        See Also:
        performAsyncUpdate()

      • getOfflineRiderRequests

        public static RequestList getOfflineRiderRequests()

      • getOfflineDriverOfferCommands

        public static OfferCommandList getOfflineDriverOfferCommands()
        Retrieves the list of offline offer commands.
        Returns:
        OfferCommandList

      • performAsyncUpdate

        public static void performAsyncUpdate()
        Updates the requestsWhereRider and requestsWhereOffered lists in the background (do not need to wait on the main UI thread at all). If a rider had made requests while offline and they regain connectivity, also adds their offline requests to elastic search.
        See Also:
        ElasticRequestController.FetchRiderRequestsTask, ElasticRequestController.GetOfferedRequestsTask

      • saveDriverOfferCommands

        public static void saveDriverOfferCommands()
        Caches the queue of driver offer commands to perform once we regain connection.

      • loadDriverOfferCommands

        public static void loadDriverOfferCommands()
        For offline functionality. Loads the cached driver offer commands queue.

      • saveSearchResults

        private static void saveSearchResults(boolean append)
        Caches the requests that the driver has searched for.
        Parameters:
        append - Boolean to tell us if we want to append or replace the saved search results

      • loadSearchResults

        private static void loadSearchResults()
        For offline functionality. Loads the cached search results.

      • getAddress

        public static java.lang.String getAddress(android.content.Context context,
                                          double latitude,
                                          double longitude)
        Get address string from a geo point
        Returns:
        the address as a string.

      • saveRiderRequests

        public static void saveRiderRequests()
        Caches the requests that the rider has made.

      • loadRiderRequests

        private static void loadRiderRequests()
        For offline functionality. Loads the cached rider requests.

      • appendRiderRequests

        private static void appendRiderRequests(Request request)
        Append to the cached rider requests.

      • saveDriverOfferedRequests

        public static void saveDriverOfferedRequests()
        Caches the requests that the driver offered to fulfill.

      • loadDriverOfferedRequests

        private static void loadDriverOfferedRequests()
        For offline functionality. Loads the cached driver offered requests.

      • saveOfflineRiderRequests

        public static void saveOfflineRiderRequests()
        For offline functionality. Saves the offline rider requests from the controller to file.

      • loadOfflineRiderRequests

        private static void loadOfflineRiderRequests()
        For offline functionality. Loads the offlineRiderRequests from file into the controller.

      • pruneByPrice

        public static void pruneByPrice(@NonNull
                                java.lang.Double minPrice,
                                @Nullable
                                java.lang.Double maxPrice)
        Ensures that the request controller on has results for requests within the price range of minPrice to maxPrice. (This affects getResult).
        Parameters:
        minPrice - The minimum value you wish to prune by.
        maxPrice - The maximum value you wish to prune by. (Passing null is equivalent to passing positive infinity)

      • pruneByPricePerKM

        public static void pruneByPricePerKM(@NonNull
                                     java.lang.Double minPricePerKM,
                                     @Nullable
                                     java.lang.Double maxPricePerKM)
        Ensures that the request controller only has results for requests within the price per kilometer range of minPricePerKM to maxPricePerKM. (This affects getResult).
        Parameters:
        minPricePerKM - The minimum value you wish to prune by.
        maxPricePerKM - The maximum value you wish to prune by. (Passing null is equivalent to passing positive infinity)
